entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: Heavy rain spreading north, then clearing from the south. Amounts may approach warning criteria. Impact: Streams and rivers may rise rapidly. Surface flooding, slips, and difficult driving conditions possible. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: High.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: A period of heavy rain. Rainfall amounts may approach warning criteria within 15 km east of the main divide. Impact: Streams and rivers may rise rapidly. Surface flooding, slips, and difficult driving conditions possible. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: High.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Strong Wind Watch
entry.summary: Northwest winds may approach severe gale in exposed places. Note, another burst of strong winds is expected later on Monday and a warning is likely to be issued for these gales closer to the time. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Strong Wind Watch
entry.summary: Northwest winds are likely to reach severe gale in exposed places. Impact: Damage to trees, powerlines, and unsecured structures possible. Driving may be difficult, especially for high-sided vehicles and motorcycles. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: High.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Strong Wind Watch
entry.summary: Northwest winds may approach severe gale in exposed places. Note, a further burst of strong winds is expected later on Monday and this Watch may be extended or a Warning issued. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: Snow flurries are possible Saturday afternoon and evening but little, if any, is expected to accumulate. Snow showers are expected to return Saturday night or Sunday morning. 2 to 5 cm of snow may accumulate above 800 metres until around midday Sunday.
